tips: In the vanilla game, the 'In Shining Armor' perk has no effect
The intelligence implant can be obtained at level 1 to maximise its effect
Pick your desired perks first, min-max your skills and SPECIAL after
Maganizes can be used to pass checks without the required skill points
Removing the Tag, Comprehension, and Educated perks can free additional perk slots if skills are selected well
The Weapon Handling perk can save you two points in Stength
